name: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead - Dedicated Developer
blurb: Open-source roguelike survivalcraft/driving game in a sci-fi zombie apocalypse needs a full-time developer to accelerate development.

rewards.reward: ROLL CALL Tier - One of the developers, playing the role of a resource-starved survivor, will read your name off a list of contributors while fighting off zombies... dressed in an outfit decided on by the votes of all backers. The outfit is likely to be ludicrous.

ZOMBIE Tier - Gain exclusive access to regular updates from Ethan's Developer Journal, as he works on developing different aspects of the game. These will touch on the challenges he faces, his goals, and his current projects, as well as his philosophy on game design. This reward is included in all rewards of equal or greater value.

SURVIVOR Tier - Your name will be added to the list of in-game names, and will be randomly available for applying to NPCs, in game logs and journals, and as a random player name.\r\n\r\nWe reserve the right to refuse offensive names or names that clash with the feel and theme of the game.

EXPLORER Tier - Submit a description of a character to add to the game. Decide on name, equipment, and potentially other features depending on which NPC stretch goals are reached. This character will be added to the game as an NPC. You will be limited to a decent but not exceptional selection of skills and equipment.

MIGRANT Tier - Your name will be added to the list of in-game names, and will be randomly available for applying to NPCs, in game logs and journals, and as a random player name. We reserve the right to refuse offensive names or names that clash with the feel and theme of the game.

SETTLER Tier - Send the developers a floor-plan of your house (or the house you want) and have it added to the game as an actual visitable location. The floorplan can end up no larger than 24x24 characters, the size of a standard in-game plot of land. One floor only.\r\n\r\nLimited in size to one in-game plot, so some cuts to the design may need to be made.

DIGITAL ART Tier - Gain access to an exclusive high quality piece of digital wallpaper designed by the incredibly Jordy Lakiere as a thank you for your support of Cataclysm. The reward included in this tier will expand if certain stretch goals are reached. Every tier of equal or greater value includes this tier.

HOMESTEADER tier - Send the developers a floor-plan of your house (or the house you want) and have it added to the game as an actual visitable location. This house has a max size of up to 48x24 characters and three floors, giving you 6 times as much potential space to work with as the the SETTLER tier.

HUNTER Tier - Submit a description of a character to add to the game. Decide on name, equipment, and potentially other features depending on which NPC stretch goals are reached. This character will be added to the game as an NPC. You will be limited to a decent but not exceptional selection of skills and equipment.

APOCALYPSE PIONEER tier - Your time in the wastes have... changed you. Develop a survivor NPC like the Explorer Tier, but you have access to higher tier equipment, mutations, cybernetic enhancements or advanced skills. More choices may be available to you if certain NPC-focused stretch goals are reached.

APOCALYPSE MUTANT tier - Your time in the wastes have... changed you. Develop a survivor NPC like the Explorer Tier, but you have access to higher tier equipment, mutations, cybernetic enhancements or advanced skills. More choices may be available to you if certain NPC-focused stretch goals are reached.

JOURNALIST Tier - We will add a custom story about a character you describe. Journal entries will be placed in game, and the story will be uniquely yours. The journal may be found next to a corpse or on an NPC that matches your description.

PREMIUM SUPPORTER tier - You will receive a hand-written letter of thank you from the developers of Cataclysm. Includes your choice of one other non-physical tiers, even limited tiers with no slots remaining.

SURVIVAL KIT tier (Starter Kit) - Unique Cataclysm-themed "survival" kit. Be ready for the apocalypse! Thrilling and exclusive Cataclysm-branded content such as a pen-knife, lighter, T-shirt. Comes in a cheap wooden box. Don't forget to grab your gas mask (gas mask not included). Includes your choice of two other non-physical tiers.

SURVIVAL KIT tier (DIY Kit) - Unique Cataclysm-themed "survival" kit. Provides you the tools you'll need to rebuild society from the ashes using only scavenged materials and the tools and resources found inside. Lovingly hand-crafted by one of the developers.  Contains invaluable items such as a rock, knife, spraypaint, rope, nails and string, An amazing deal for this one-of-a-kind item! Includes your choice of two other non-physical tiers.

SURVIVAL KIT tier (Science Kit) - Unique Cataclysm-themed "survival" kit. Because the end of the world is the perfect time... for SCIENCE! Contains numerous vials and scientific utensils. We don't know what they do or why the labels are so cryptic - think of it as an opportunity to experiment. Comes in well-padded Cataclysm-branded metal container. Includes your choice of two other non-physical tiers.
